prayer_binding: Bound by His Word. Preserved by His Spirit.

1.text: But God meant it unto good, to bring to pass, as it is this day, to save much people alive.
1.spiritual_significance: Divine providence turning evil into blessing
1.prayer_marker: Milestone of divine providence - God works all things for good

2.text: And God spake all these words, saying,
2.spiritual_significance: The voice that thundered commandments from Sinai
2.prayer_marker: Milestone of divine law - God's voice speaking eternal truth

3.text: And the LORD spake unto Moses and to Aaron, saying,
3.prayer_marker: Milestone of sanctification - Holy communication to holy servants

4.target_prayer: Milestone of divine order - God establishes His people

5.target_prayer: Milestone of divine counting - Every soul matters to God

6.target_prayer: Milestone of remembrance - Remember all the way the Lord led

7.target_prayer: Milestone of witness - Heaven and earth bear witness

8.target_prayer: Milestone of conquest - The Lord fights for His people

9.target_prayer: Milestone of deliverance - God raises up deliverers

10.target_prayer: Milestone of redemption - The kinsman redeemer comes

11.target_prayer: Milestone of faith - Little becomes much in God's hands

12.target_prayer: Milestone of covenant - God's promises endure forever

13.target_prayer: Milestone of glory - God's presence fills the temple

14.target_prayer: Milestone of translation - Taken up in chariots of fire

15.target_prayer: Milestone of worship - Let everything praise the Lord

16.target_prayer: Milestone of divine fire - Fire from heaven consumes sacrifice

17.target_prayer: Milestone of restoration - The altar rebuilt on its foundation

18.target_prayer: Milestone of revival - The Word read to all the people

19.target_prayer: Milestone of testing - Though He slay me, yet will I trust

20.target_prayer: Milestone of shepherding - The Lord is my shepherd

21.target_prayer: Milestone of wisdom - The fear of the Lord is beginning

22.target_prayer: Milestone of seasons - To everything there is a season

23.target_prayer: Milestone of vision - Holy, holy, holy is the Lord

24.target_prayer: Milestone of calling - Before you were born, I knew you

25.target_prayer: Milestone of glory - Visions of God in living creatures

26.target_prayer: Milestone of prophecy - God reveals deep and secret things

27.target_prayer: Milestone of blessing - The Sermon on the Mount begins

28.target_prayer: Milestone of grace - The lost sheep, coin, and son

29.target_prayer: Milestone of comfort - Let not your heart be troubled

30.target_prayer: Milestone of freedom - No condemnation in Christ Jesus

31.target_prayer: Milestone of eternity - New heaven and new earth

milestone_prayers.completion_prayer: Holy God, another milestone in Your sacred Word! Line [LINE] reached - [VERSE]. Let this anchor point stand firm through all 777 readings. Your Word is a lamp unto my feet and a light unto my path.
milestone_prayers.establishment_prayer: Lord Jesus, I establish this milestone as a pillar in the spiritual scaffolding of Scripture. From Genesis to Revelation, Your Word builds eternal architecture. Blessed be Your name.
milestone_prayers.anchor_blessing: Bound by His Word. Preserved by His Spirit. This milestone stands forever.
